name: New Taxi Driver USA
description:
New Taxi Driver USA is a new and latest cool night taxi driving game in simulation category. You might have been in the yellow taxi but never have been on a taxi driving seat!!! If you are crazy about taxi driving then hurry up download free taxi app and enjoy wild electric taxi driving on the busy roads of modern city.
features:

-Drive taxi as fast as possible.
-Many traveling missions.
-Large selection of taxies.
-Enjoy drive from multiple views.
-Easy to use slider pedals, for a better control
-HD eye catching 3D graphics.
-Smooth and handy game play.
